tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE ProductionStage1QualityCheck (id INT, product_name VARCHAR(255), check_result BOOLEAN);
CREATE TABLE ProductionStage2QualityCheck (id INT, product_name VARCHAR(255), check_result BOOLEAN, issue_found BOOLEAN);
CREATE TABLE ProductionStage3QualityCheck (id INT, product_name VARCHAR(255), check_result BOOLEAN, issue_found BOOLEAN, resolution VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE OverallQualityReport (id INT, product_name VARCHAR(255), final_check_result BOOLEAN, total_defects INT);
